All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
AbstractDAO represents a generic form of the Data Access Objects and implements the methods that retrieve/modify/add to the database
AllView
AllView is the GUI Class that is used to see the products or clients in a JTable.
Client
Client represents the model of a client, with id, name, address and age.
ClientBLL
ClientBLL contains an instance variable of a Controller object and a ClientDAO one.
ClientBoxView
ClientBoxView is used to get the information for the clients that are to be added, removed or updated.
ClientDAO
ClientDAO extends AbstractDAO with the type parameter Client, having the inherited methods to access the database.
ClientView
ClientView is the GUI Window set for configuring the clients in the database, as having buttons for adding, removing, updating or viewing all clients
ConnectionFactory
ConnectionFactory is a class used to establish the connection between the database and the program
Controller
The controller manages the GUI windows and retrieves/gives the necessary data from the GUI and to the business logic objects.
Main
Main starts the whole program, instantiating the needed objects for the GUI and business logic objects
Order
Order represents the model of an order, having the ids of itself, the client, product, the price per unit of the product, the quantity desired and the total to be paid.
OrderBLL
OrderBLL contains an instance variable of a Controller object, a ClientDAO, a ProductDAO and an OrderDAO.
OrderDAO
OrderDAO extends AbstractDAO with the parameter Order
OrderView
OrderView represents the GUI interface that is used to create an order, having the user input the id of the product, the client and the quantity desired
Product
Product represents the model of a product, with id, name, price and quantity in stock.
ProductBLL
ProductBLL contains an instance variable of a Controller object and a ProductDAO one.
ProductBoxView
ProductBoxView is used to get the information for the products that are to be added, removed or updated.
ProductDAO
ProductDAO extends AbstractDAO with the type parameter Product, having the inherited methods to access the database.
ProductView
ProductView is the GUI Window set for configuring the products in the database, as having buttons for adding, removing, updating or viewing all products
StartView
